statements: DELETE FROM cost_effectiveness_analysis WHERE intervention_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
DELETE FROM cost_effectiveness_analysis WHERE outcome = 'Positive';
DELETE FROM cost_effectiveness_analysis WHERE intervention_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
DELETE FROM cost_effectiveness_analysis WHERE cost > 1000 AND outcome = 'Positive';
DELETE FROM CostData WHERE intervention_id = 1;
DELETE FROM OutcomeData WHERE trial_id = 10;
DELETE FROM CostData WHERE cost > 1000 AND outcome = 'success';
DELETE FROM OutcomeData WHERE intervention_id IN (SELECT intervention_id FROM CostData WHERE cost < 500);
DELETE FROM cost_data WHERE cost_id = 1;
DELETE FROM outcome_data WHERE outcome_id = 5;
DELETE FROM cost_data WHERE cost_id = 100 AND cost_amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM clinical_trials WHERE trial_location = 'New York' AND trial_start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM cost_effectiveness WHERE cost_effectiveness_ratio < 1.5
DELETE FROM trial_results WHERE study_id = 5
DELETE FROM cost_data WHERE study_id = 1001;
DELETE FROM trial_results WHERE study_id = 2002 AND effectiveness > 0.75;
DELETE FROM PatientDetails WHERE age > 60 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM TrialInfo WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM CostData WHERE patient_id = 1 OR cost > 1000;
DELETE FROM InterventionDetails WHERE intervention_type = 'Surgery' AND duration_days < 10;
